contents.title: Breakpoints
contents.description: Breakpoints (screen sizes) that wrap utility classes.

contents.title: box-decoration-break
contents.description: Sets rendering of an element's fragments when broken across multiple lines, columns, or pages.

contents.title: container
contents.description: Sets max-width to match min-width of the current breakpoint.

contents.title: box-sizing
contents.description: Sets how the total width and height of an element is calculated.

contents.title: display
contents.description: Sets the display box type of an element.

contents.title: float
contents.description: Sets an element's placement to a side of its container and allows content to wrap around it.

contents.title: clear
contents.description: Sets whether an element is moved below preceding floated elements.

contents.title: isolation
contents.description: Sets whether an element creates a stacking context.

contents.title: object-fit
contents.description: Sets how the content of a replaced element (img or video tag) should be resized.

contents.title: object-position
contents.description: Sets the alignment of the selected replaced element.

contents.title: overflow
contents.description: Sets how to handle content that's too big for its container.

contents.title: overscroll
contents.description: Sets browser behavior upon reaching the boundary of a scrolling area.

contents.title: position
contents.description: Sets an element's position.

contents.title: top, right, bottom, left
contents.description: Sets the placement of a positioned element.

contents.title: visibility
contents.description: Show or hide without affecting the layout of the document.

contents.title: z-index
contents.description: Sets the z-order ('stack order') of a positioned element.

contents.title: padding
contents.description: Controls padding in 0.25rem increments.

contents.title: margin
contents.description: Controls margin (and negative margin) in 0.25rem increments.

contents.title: space between
contents.description: Sets left or top (x or y) margin between child elements, but skips the first element.

contents.title: background-attachment
contents.description: Sets behavior of background images when scrolling.

contents.title: background-clip
contents.description: Sets where a background extends.

contents.title: background-color
contents.description: Sets background color.

contents.title: background opacity
contents.description: Sets background opacity when used with bg-[color].

contents.title: background-position
contents.description: Sets position of a background image.

contents.title: background-repeat
contents.description: Sets repetition of a background image.

contents.title: background-size
contents.description: Sets background size of a background image.

contents.title: background-image
contents.description: Sets background image.

contents.title: gradient color
contents.description: Sets the background color gradients and where to stop.

contents.title: border-collapse
contents.description: Collapse or separate table borders.

contents.title: table-layout
contents.description: Defines the algorithm used to lay out table cells, rows, and columns.

contents.title: scale
contents.description: Scales an element that has transform applied.

contents.title: rotate
contents.description: Rotates an element that has transform applied.

contents.title: translate
contents.description: Translates an element that has transform applied.

contents.title: skew
contents.description: Skews an element that has transform applied.

contents.title: transform-origin
contents.description: Sets the origin of an element's transforms. Think of the origin as pushing a thumbtack into the element at the specified position.

contents.title: transform
contents.description: Sets the transform of an element.

contents.title: box-shadow
contents.description: Sets the shadow around an element.

contents.title: opacity
contents.description: Sets the transparency of an element.

contents.title: mix-blend-mode
contents.description: Sets how an element blends with the background.

contents.title: background-blend-mode
contents.description: Sets how an element's background images blend with its background color.

contents.title: display
contents.description: Sets element to be a flex container.

contents.title: flex-direction
contents.description: Sets direction of flex items.

contents.title: flex-wrap
contents.description: Creates how flex items wrap.

contents.title: flex
contents.description: Controls how flex items grow and shrink.

contents.title: flex-grow
contents.description: Controls how flex items grow.

contents.title: flex-shrink
contents.description: Controls how flex items shrink.

contents.title: order
contents.description: Controls how flex items are ordered.

contents.title: width
contents.description: Sets the width of an element.

contents.title: min-width
contents.description: Sets the minimum width of an element.

contents.title: max-width
contents.description: Sets the maximum width of an element.

contents.title: height
contents.description: Sets the height of an element.

contents.title: min-height
contents.description: Sets the minimum height of an element.

contents.title: max-height
contents.description: Sets the maximum height of an element.

contents.title: border-radius
contents.description: Sets border radius.

contents.title: border-width
contents.description: Sets border width in increments of 1px.

contents.title: border-color
contents.description: Sets border color.

contents.title: border opacity
contents.description: Sets border opacity when used with border-[color].

contents.title: border-style
contents.description: Sets border style.

contents.title: divide width
contents.description: Sets left or top (x or y) border width between child elements, but skips the first element.

contents.title: divide color
contents.description: Sets border color between child elements when using divide width.

contents.title: divide opacity
contents.description: Sets border opacity between elements when used with divide-[color].

contents.title: divide style
contents.description: Sets border style between elements when using divide width.

contents.title: ring width
contents.description: Sets the width of outline rings using box shadows.

contents.title: ring color
contents.description: Sets the color of the outline ring.

contents.title: ring opacity
contents.description: Sets the opacity of the outline ring.

contents.title: ring offset width
contents.description: Sets an offset for outline rings.

contents.title: ring offset color
contents.description: Sets the color of the outline ring offset.

contents.title: transition-property
contents.description: Sets the CSS properties affected by transition animations.

contents.title: transition-duration
contents.description: Sets the length of time for a transition animations to complete.

contents.title: transition-timing-function
contents.description: Sets the easing function of transition animations.

contents.title: transition-delay
contents.description: Sets the delay for transitions.

contents.title: animation
contents.description: Sets CSS animations.

contents.title: appearance
contents.description: Disables native styling based on the operating system's theme.

contents.title: cursor
contents.description: Changes the cursor when hovering over an element.

contents.title: outline
contents.description: Sets the outline of the element.

contents.title: pointer-events
contents.description: Specifies whether an element is the target of mouse events.

contents.title: resize
contents.description: Sets whether an element is resizable, along with direction.

contents.title: user-select
contents.description: Controls whether the user can select text.

contents.title: accessibility
contents.description: Controls whether an element is visually hidden but still accessible to screen readers.

contents.title: fill
contents.description: Sets the color to paint an SVG.

contents.title: stroke
contents.description: Sets the outline color of an SVG.

contents.title: stroke-width
contents.description: Sets the outline width of an SVG.

contents.title: grid-template-columns
contents.description: Defines columns for grid layout.

contents.title: grid-column, start/end
contents.description: Sets a grid item size and location within the grid column.

contents.title: grid-template-rows
contents.description: Defines rows for grid layout.

contents.title: grid-row, start/end
contents.description: Sets a grid item size and location within the grid row.

contents.title: grid-auto-flow
contents.description: Controls the auto placement of grid elements.

contents.title: grid-auto-columns
contents.description: Controls the size of auto-generated (implicit) grid columns.

contents.title: grid-auto-rows
contents.description: Controls the size of auto-generated (implicit) grid rows.

contents.title: gap
contents.description: Sets the gaps (gutters) between rows and columns.

contents.title: justify-content
contents.description: Controls how flex items are positioned along container's main axis.

contents.title: justify-items
contents.description: Controls default alignment for items on the inline axis for grids.

contents.title: justify-self
contents.description: Controls element alignment on the inline axis for a grid item.

contents.title: align-content
contents.description: Controls how lines are positioned in multi-line flex containers.

contents.title: align-items
contents.description: Sets flex items position along a container's cross axis.

contents.title: align-self
contents.description: Controls how an individual flex item is positioned along container's cross axis.

contents.title: place-content
contents.description: Controls alignment in both directions at once for grid or flexbox.

contents.title: place-items
contents.description: Controls alignment of items in both directions at once for grid or flexbox.

contents.title: place-self
contents.description: Controls alignment of individual element in both directions at once for grid or flexbox.

contents.title: text color
contents.description: Sets the text color.

contents.title: text opacity
contents.description: Sets text opacity when used with text-[color].

contents.title: font-family
contents.description: Sets the font family.

contents.title: font-size
contents.description: Sets the font size.

contents.title: font-smoothing
contents.description: Sets the antialiasing of the font.

contents.title: font-style
contents.description: Sets the style of the font.

contents.title: font-weight
contents.description: Sets the font weight.

contents.title: font-variant-numeric
contents.description: Sets the font number variant.

contents.title: letter-spacing
contents.description: Sets the spacing between letters.

contents.title: line-height
contents.description: Sets the line height.

contents.title: list-style-type
contents.description: Sets the bullet style of a list.

contents.title: list-style-position
contents.description: Sets the position of a list's bullets.

contents.title: ::placeholder color
contents.description: Sets the placeholder color using the ::placeholder pseudo element.

contents.title: ::placeholder opacity
contents.description: Sets the placeholder opacity when used with placeholder-[color].

contents.title: text-align
contents.description: Sets the alignment of text.

contents.title: text-decoration
contents.description: Sets the text-decoration of an element.

contents.title: text-transform
contents.description: Sets the capitalization of text.

contents.title: text-overflow
contents.description: Sets the overflow of text.

contents.title: vertical-align
contents.description: Sets the vertical alignment of an inline or table-cell box.

contents.title: white-space
contents.description: Sets the whitespace of an element.

contents.title: word-break
contents.description: Sets the word breaks of an element.

contents.title: filter
contents.description: Sets filter on elements.

contents.title: blur
contents.description: Sets blur filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: brightness
contents.description: Sets brightness filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: contrast
contents.description: Sets contrast filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: drop-shadow
contents.description: Sets drop-shadow filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: grayscale
contents.description: Sets grayscale filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: hue-rotate
contents.description: Sets hue-rotate filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: invert
contents.description: Sets invert filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: saturate
contents.description: Sets saturate filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: sepia
contents.description: Sets sepia filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-filter
contents.description: Sets backdrop filter filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-blur
contents.description: Sets backdrop blur filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-brightness
contents.description: Sets backdrop brightness filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-contrast
contents.description: Sets backdrop contrast filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-grayscale
contents.description: Sets backdrop grayscale filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-hue-rotate
contents.description: Sets backdrop hue-rotate filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-invert
contents.description: Sets backdrop invert filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-opacity
contents.description: Sets backdrop opacity filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-saturate
contents.description: Sets backdrop saturate filter on elements (use with filter utility).

contents.title: backdrop-sepia
contents.description: Sets backdrop sepia filter on elements (use with filter utility).
